question: From four corners of a square sheet of side 4 cm, four pieces each in the shape of arc of a circle with radius 2 cm, are cut out. The area of the remaining portion is:
explanation: Area of sectors $latex = \\pi\\times r^{2} = 4\\pi cm^{2}$ => Area of square = 4 $latex \\times $ 4 = 16 sq.cm. ∴ Area of the remaining portion = (16 - 4π) sq.cm. Hence option [B] is the right answer.
